data.trans: Phụ thuộc vào, tùy thuộc vào
data.trans_hint: Tùy thuộc vào khả năng của mỗi thành viên mà trưởng nhóm xây dựng lộ trình đào tạo phù hợp.
data.en_hint: Depending on the ability of each member, the leader develops a suitable training schedule.
data.content_game_1: depending on the ability of each member, the leader develops a suitable training schedule.
data.answer_en_hint: depending on the ability of each member, the leader develops a suitable training schedule.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy được thừa hưởng tài sản sau khi cha cô ấy mất.
data.en_hint: She came into a fortune when her father died.
data.content_game_1: She came into a fortune when her father died.
data.answer_en_hint: She came into a fortune when her father died.

data.trans_hint: Tôi thực sự cần bố mẹ tôi vào lúc này vì tôi cháy túi rồi.
data.en_hint: I really need to depend on my parents now as I'm totally broke.
data.content_game_1: I really need to depend on my parents now as I'm totally broke.
data.answer_en_hint: I really need to depend on my parents now as I'm totally broke.

data.trans: Phụ thuộc (vào cái gì để ra quyết định)
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy phụ thuộc tài chính vào các khoản tiết kiệm vì hiện tại cô ấy đang thất nghiệp.
data.en_hint: She financially depends on her savings as she is out of work at the moment.
data.content_game_1: She financially depends on her savings as she is out of work at the moment.
data.answer_en_hint: She financially depends on her savings as she is out of work at the moment.

data.trans_hint: Sau khi tôi quay trở lại, đầu tiên tôi sẽ đưa cả gia đình đến một nhà hàng trang trọng để ăn mừng.
data.en_hint: After I come back, for a start, I will take my family out to a nice restaurant to celebrate.
data.content_game_1: After I come back, for a start, I will take my family out to a nice restaurant to celebrate.
data.answer_en_hint: After I come back, for a start, I will take my family out to a nice restaurant to celebrate.

data.trans_hint: Tôi định quyên góp những bộ quần áo này cho quỹ từ thiện để hỗ trợ cho các trẻ em vùng sâu vùng xa.
data.en_hint: I mean to give those clothes away for charity to support children in remote areas.
data.content_game_1: I mean to give those clothes away for charity to support children in remote areas.
data.answer_en_hint: I mean to give those clothes away for charity to support children in remote areas.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ của hắn không thể giúp hắn với khoản nợ khổng lồ này được, nên hắn phải tự mình giải quyết.
data.en_hint: His mom can't help him out with his huge debt, so he has to handle it himself.
data.content_game_1: His mom can't help him out with his huge debt, so he has to handle it himself.
data.answer_en_hint: His mom can't help him out with his huge debt, so he has to handle it himself.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đang tìm một quỹ từ thiện cần hỗ trợ tài chính để giúp đỡ những đứa trẻ đáng thương này.
data.en_hint: I'm looking for a charity that's in need of financial support for those poor children.
data.content_game_1: I'm looking for a charity that's in need of financial support for those poor children.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm looking for a charity that's in need of financial support for those poor children.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã muốn giữ kín về vụ đầu tư cho tới khi nó có thành quả.
data.en_hint: I wanted to keep quiet about my investment until it came to fruition.
data.content_game_1: I wanted to keep quiet about my investment until it came to fruition.
data.answer_en_hint: I wanted to keep quiet about my investment until it came to fruition.

data.trans_hint: Số tiền tôi đã nén cho cô ấy nên được giữ kín vì tôi không thích cô ấy biết chuyện đó.
data.en_hint: The money I secretly gave her should be on the quiet as I don't want her to know about it.
data.content_game_1: The money I secretly gave her should be on the quiet as I don't want her to know about it.
data.answer_en_hint: The money I secretly gave her should be on the quiet as I don't want her to know about it.

data.trans_hint: Kể từ khi trúng số độc đắc, cậu ta lúc nào cũng rủng rỉnh tiền bạc.
data.en_hint: Since the time when hitting the jackpot, he has been rolling in money.
data.content_game_1: Since the time when hitting the jackpot, he has been rolling in money.
data.answer_en_hint: Since the time when hitting the jackpot, he has been rolling in money.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta mua ngay một con xe mắc tiền ngay sau khi tậu được số tiền thưởng.
data.en_hint: He has just splashed out on an expensive car after earning his bonus.
data.content_game_1: He has just splashed out on an expensive car after earning his bonus.
data.answer_en_hint: He has just splashed out on an expensive car after earning his bonus.
